name: Greenever Hills
description: The land grows hilly and green as you continue eastward. A small community lies at the bottom of the valley ahead. Various plants grow in the fields before you. The tower in the distance still appears to be very far away.

name: Eightsfret Glen
description: Near the bottom of the valley the road splits in three. The side paths each lead to a small set of buildings, while the middle path leads on toward the tower in the distance.

name: Stormwood
description: The path leads into a forest of exceptionally tall trees. The canopy above is filled with the calls of wild creatures.

name: Lunacrest Bridge
description: The forest opens to a bridge that leads across a shallow but wide river. Here and there along the bridge vendors have set up shop. The tower in the distance seems to be near the center of a large city on the other side of the bridge.
